pages.text: And We have certainly created the human being and We know what his soul seduces him to it, and We are closer to him than the jugular vein
when the two receivers (or recorders) sitting on the right and on the left receive (and record his works)
He does not speak a word unless there is an observer with him ready (to record)
And the agony of death comes in truth, which is what you were keeping away from it
And the trumpet is blown. That is the day of the threat
And every one comes with a driver (who steers him) and a witness
You were negligent of this, so We removed your cover from you, and today your eyesight is sharp
And his companion (angel) says: this is what is ready with me (record of his deeds)
Throw into hell every stubborn disbelievers
who prevented from the good, exceeded the limits, and was a doubter
the one who set up another god with God, so throw him into the severe punishment
His companion (devil) says: our Master, I did not make him rebel, but he was lost far (from the right path)
He (God) says: do not dispute before Me while I have sent the threat to you in advance
The word (of punishment) will not be changed with Me, and I am not a wrongdoer to My servants
On a day that We say to hell: are you filled? And it says: are there some more
And the garden is brought near for those who control themselves, and it is not far
This is what was promised to all who turn (to God) keeping (His commands)
anyone who fears the beneficent in the secret and comes with a repenting heart
(We tell him) enter it with peace (and well-being), this is the eternal day
They have whatever they want in it, and there is more with Us
